judges: Before Steabne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam.,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Bok.
opinions.author: Per Curiam.,

attorneys: Judgment entered for defendants. Plaintiffs appealed.
Philip Richman, with him Richman & Richman, for appellants.
Jerome J. Shestack, First Deputy City Solicitor, with Mm Herbert M. Linsenberg, Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Eggleston, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued November 11, 1954.
Before Steabne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Judgment entered for defendants. Plaintiffs appealed.
Philip Richman, with him Richman & Richman, for appellants.
January 3, 1955:
Jerome J. Shestack, First Deputy City Solicitor, with Mm Herbert M. Linsenberg, Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellees.
